title: Won’t Be a Rehabilitation
detail_text: <:th_ch0002/>Fuu, we worked up quite a sweat<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Haah~, even if it’s just running, it’s fun when you do it in a big park, isn’t it? It goes by so quickly while you’re looking at the many different sceneries<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Yeah. I feel like running with Emma made up for the fact that I have been quite unhealthy recently….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eli-chan, Eli-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Ah, sorry. What is it, Emma?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Actually, there’s a fruit sandwich shop not far from here, want to go? The sandwiches are filled with stuff like melon, mango, and strawberry, it looks delicious!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Eh…. Umm, we just worked out, so today is…. Uhh….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>It’s fruit so it’s good for you! Look, vitamins are great for your skin! Since we got a lot of sunshine today, we have to take in a lot of vitamins too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Since it’s fruit…. I wonder if it’s low calorie….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>That’s right, Eli-chan! If you’re worried about calories, then just one should be fine. Come on, let’s go~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Y-, yeah. If it’s just one….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
